name: Namor McKenzie
text: Deep: Namor McKenzie gets +2 REC. Symbol of Royalty — Setup: Search your deck and discard pile for Neptune's Trident and add it to your hand. (Shuffle.)

name: Namor
text: Deep: Namor gets +1 THW, +1 ATK and +1 DEF. Arrogance — Forced Interrupt: When Namor is targeted by another friendly character's Action, discard 1 card from your hand.

flavor: “No one may come near the person of the Sub-Mariner.” -Namor McKenzie
name: Atlantean Skin
text: Deep: Draw 1 card. Hero Action: Give your hero a tough status card.

name: Furious Strike
text: Deep: Ready Namor. Hero Action (attack): Deal 7 damage to an enemy.

name: Imperius Rex!
text: Hero Interrupt: When you use a basic power, get +1 to that power for this use. Then, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Add one to your hand and discard the other.

flavor: “You are trespassing on sacred ground. I will see you gone. One way or another.” -Namor McKenzie
name: Royal Authority
text: Deep: Remove 2 threat from a scheme. Hero Action (thwart): Remove 3 threat from a scheme.

flavor: “We will retake what is ours!” -Namor McKenzie
name: Wrath of the Sea
text: Hero Action: Deal 10 damage to an enemy. (Deep: You may divide damage dealt by this card among enemies as you choose.)

name: Atlantis
text: Your hero gets +1 hand size (Deep: +2 hand size instead). Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Atlantis → choose to either discard the top 4 cards from your deck or shuffle the bottom-most 4 cards from your discard pile into your deck.

name: Ankle Wings
text: If you control another copy of Ankle Wings, your hero gains the [[aerial]] trait. Hero Resource: Exhaust Ankle Wings → generate a [energy] resource. (Deep: generate a [wild] resource instead.)

name: Neptune's Trident
text: Restricted. Your hero gains retaliate 1. Hero Response: After you pay for an event using a [energy] resource, discard the top card of your deck. If it is a Namor card, add it to your hand.
